home.subtitle: With Intelligent Insight
home.description: The intelligent platform for university students to share ideas, summarize complex materials with LLM-AI, and collaborate on a global academic scale.
home.featuresSubtitle: Designed specifically for the rigorous demands of modern higher education, combining community knowledge with cutting-edge AI.

feature1.title: AI-Powered Insights
feature1.desc: Instantly summarize complex academic papers and textbooks using advanced AI tools.

feature2.title: Collaborative Learning
feature2.desc: Share your notes and insights with peers and build a collective academic knowledge base.

feature3.title: Deep Focus Mode
feature3.desc: Optimized reading experience designed to reduce eye strain during long study sessions.

feature4.title: Smart Search
feature4.desc: Quickly find exactly what you need with intelligent semantic search.
